job.title: Data Engineer
job.description:
We are Hiring Data Engineers for our Client. IF you are interested then please send me your updated resume.

Role: Data Engineer

Experience : 1+ years of Experience
Contract : Long Term Contract - only W2 , not open for C2C.

Skills:
1. Spark
2. SQL
3. Python
4. AWS
